name: js-framework-benchmark
description: Simple Benchmark for Javascript client side rendering

scripts.bench: cd webdriver-ts && cross-env LANG="en_US.UTF-8" node dist/benchmarkRunner.js
scripts.bench-all: cd webdriver-ts && npm run bench && npm run results
scripts.selenium: cd webdriver-ts && npm run bench && npm run results
scripts.install-webdriver-ts: cd webdriver-ts && npm install && npm run build-prod
scripts.install-local: npm run install-webdriver-ts && npm run install-webdriver-ts-results
scripts.docker-start: cross-env-shell docker run --rm -d -p 8080:8080 --name js-framework-benchmark --volume ${INIT_CWD}:/src --volume js-framework-benchmark:/build js-framework-benchmark-ubuntu
scripts.docker-sync: docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark rsync -avC --exclude /index.html --exclude /framework/**/dist --exclude /webdriver-ts*/dist --exclude package-lock.json --exclude node_modules --exclude /webdriver-ts/results*/ /src/ /build/
scripts.docker-build-frameworks: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark npm install && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark node build.js
scripts.docker-install-webdriver: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark npm run install-local
scripts.docker-create-index: docker exec -it -w /build/webdriver-ts js-framework-benchmark npm run index
scripts.docker-rebuild: docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark cp /src/docker-rebuild.js /build/ && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark node docker-rebuild.js
scripts.docker-results: docker exec -it -w /build/webdriver-ts js-framework-benchmark npm run results
scripts.docker-dev-webdriver: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it -w /build/webdriver-ts js-framework-benchmark npm run compile && docker exec -it -w /build/webdriver-ts js-framework-benchmark node dist/benchmarkRunner.js --headless
scripts.docker-lerna-bootstrap: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark npm run lerna-bootstrap
scripts.docker-lerna-build-all: npm run docker-sync && docker exec -it js-framework-benchmark npm run lerna-build-all

author: Stefan Krause
